MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH6 postcode area of Edinburgh, affecting properties in 26 Prince Regent street. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 5:30pm due to faulty electrical equipment and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:59pm on Monday, 16 November 2020
